archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0039
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to purchase multiple products in one buy journey, so that I can easily purchase everything I need

properties.value: Multiple products meaning one plan, one device + one or many options / accessories - OOTB. Bulk ordering available in CRM, will be implemented for Enterprise Portal
DS, SC, EP, OM, PC, PIM

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
